Disconnected from master of world. Returning to your world.
Touch the sign of the Gravelord Servant
Retrieve remaining power of dark spirit
Grave of a nameless retainer. Raised his sword for the Lord of Cinder.
Died in solitude. May his soul find its way back to the Frigid Valley.
To honour and shadowy retreats. Fear the sun's temptations, and the winged executioner.
This exile was chased from his homeland, and haunted by a black sun.
Grave of a nameless retainer. Raised his sword for the Lord of Cinder.
Died in solitude. May his soul find its way back to the Frigid Valley.
To honour and shadowy retreats. Fear the sun's temptations, and the winged executioner.
This exile was chased from his homeland, and haunted by a black sun.
Aye, siwmae. And good day to you.
I'm Domhnall of Zena. I'm just, well, a peddler, of sorts.
I adore trinkets and oddities, so I trade for them.
Hm... Oh, let me guess... Looking for baubles and trinkets in this strange land?
Yes, of course. We are both strangers in this strange land. But, at least now there are two of us.
Believe it or not... Irithyll brought the Deep upon itself. Fooled by that slimy beast, he upturned the grave of gods and consumed the lot.
Ah, what? What? Who are you? Ahh, another Undead, eh? Those blasted wurms...
The lake is swarming with them. They must be killed before the ruins below can be entered.
Ahh, you think you're different? That you can handle it? Yes, I remember that feeling. For I was the same.
... So, let me help you out. With your soul-searching.
Well, you are a rare visitor. Welcome to the sanctum, ashen one.
If you seek the power of the magical arts, I may be able to help with that. I dabble in all kinds.
Watch your back out there. Mindless hollows wander the grounds surrounding the shrine.
Don't underestimate the hollows. They may be mindless, but their blades still cut deep.
Face the Guardians of Anor Londo
The memory is not yet present...
Onslaught enemies will now appear. Soul gain and Item Discovery increased.
Onslaught enemies will no longer appear.
Challenge modifiers will now be applied. Soul gain and Item Discovery increased.
Challenge modifiers will no longer be reduced.

Curses are modifiers that you may apply to yourself in exchange for a bonus.
Once enabled, a curse is applied after you rest at a bonfire, and will remain active until you disabled it at the Accursed Altar.

Empowers bosses, increasing the following: - Damage by 50%. - HP by 30%. - Stamina by 30%. - Stamina recovery by 30. - Poise by 100. - Resistances by 50%.
Enables an additional chance for a Primordial Fragment.

Lethal: reduces weapon stamina consumption by 15%. Magic: absorb 2/4/6 FP on hit, differs based on weapon type. Fire: apply stacking 1% Fire absorption debuff for 5 seconds. Lightning: apply 50% Poise debuff to target for 5 seconds. Dark: absorb 5/10/15 HP on hit, differs based on weapon type. Lucky: Increases Item Discovery by 25 and soul absorption by 10%. Enchanted: restores an additional 3 FP per second. Holy: restores an additional 3 HP per second. Sharp: consecutive attacks boost damage, up to 15%. Blunt: increases max equipment load by 10%.

Clarity: restores an additional 3 FP per second. Rejuvenation: grants an additional 15 stamina recovery. Restoration: restores an additional 3 HP per second. Respite: increases max equipment load by 10%. Lucidity: reduces spell FP consumption by 5%. Greed: increases soul absorption by 10%. Magic: increases Magic absorption by 5%. Fire: increases Fire absorption by 5%. Lightning: increases Lightning absorption by 5%. Dark: increases Dark absorption by 5%.
Pulsating: restores an additional 5 FP per second. Vibrating: restores an additional 3 HP per second. Throbbing: unlocks ascended effects for spells. Quivering: boosts cast speed by 25.
Reinforcement is no longer present. All weapons are inherently more powerful. A weapon's power is released by increasing STR, DEX, INT, FTH or LCK.

You are marked, drawing creatures towards your location.
Adds additional enemies throughout the world.
Boosts soul absorption by 5%.

Canines are drawn to your sweet flesh.
High Wall of Lothric is now occupied by numerous canine enemies.
Boosts soul absorption by 10% whilst in the High Wall of Lothric.

Crabs are drawn to your unique musk.
Road of Sacrifices and Farron Keep are now occupied by numerous crab enemies.
Boosts soul absorption by 10% whilst in the Road of Sacrifices or Farron Keep.

You are ready to face true might.
Boosts the power of bosses by 50% and increases their HP by 50%.
Enables Primordial material to drop from bosses.
Oh, there you are. I thought you'd all but forgotten me. How sweet. Good to know that a skinny little heretic can still turn heads. Here, take this memento of our sordid affair.
Ahh, hello again. Thank goodness. One can become quite attached, even to a bumbling apprentice.
Oh bother. Leave me be so that I may study.
You're here to propose to me? But I am guilty. A wretched child of the Abyss. Is that something you can forgive?
Ashen One, this is... Very much how I feel towards you. Forgive me. But I created this gift for you, I hope you enjoy it.
Ashen one, may I pose thee a question? Do you feel as I do? With the fury of the flames?
Ashen One, the fires must be tended to. Without me, they will be extinguished.
Ashen One, I am unworthy of your love. But I accept your offer.
Uncle Gael has warned me about your bad jokes. He told me to give you this.
Oh, that is funny. But I'd rather focus on my painting for now.
What an awful joke. I banish you!.
This world is awfully lonely. A friend would be welcome.
The shriveled body of Rosaria appears to squirm in a joyous manner. A gift pops out from beneath her quivering mass.
The shriveled body of Rosaria appears to squirm in a dull manner.
The shriveled body of Rosaria appears to squirm in a anxious manner.
The shriveled body of Rosaria appears to squirm in a sensual manner.
The decayed corpse of Archdeacon McDonnell appears to pulsate in a rhymathic fashion. A gift pops out from beneath his decaying mass.
The decayed corpse of Archdeacon McDonnell appears to pulsate in a dull fashion.
The decayed corpse of Archdeacon McDonnell remains absolutely still.
The decayed corpse of Archdeacon McDonnell emits a loud gaseous expulsion.
I, Yorshka, love thine heart as thou'st love the moon and sky. Here, take this token of appreciation, thou'rt most deserving of it.
My dear, thy love merit great deeds. Set forth and accomplish such deeds in thine name.
Art thou a creature of lust? Begone!
Oh, my! Thou'st love is sweet. If thou'st speak'th with true intent.
I never thought you'd confess such beautiful words to me. Hmm... What can I say? Take this trinket as a sign of my love.
Those are truly wonderful thoughts. Do they come with new trinkets too?
Aye, siwmae. Oh, you feel that way? I can't say I've thought much about you I'm afraid.
What a wonderful notion. Let us arrange an ceremony in this here cathedral.
Mwah hah hah! A splendid display of affection. Here, take this gift, you deserve it.
Believe it or not... But I to feel that way about you. That'll put some spring into your step.
You have quite some nerve. Or are you just thick?
A grand notion. Yes, magnificently so!
Yes, I remember that feeling. For I was once the same. Here, take this trinket.
Hm... Oh, yes, it's you. A kind notion, but little use in these tombs.
Let me give you a nibble of advice. Don't even consider talking to me again.
Ah, what? What? Marriage? Ahh, I guess so.
Ahh, most illustrious Lordseeker. Your words have touched me so. Take this memento as a sign of our connection.
Ah-hah, thou'rt returned. What's to fear in a little tenderness, now?
Knowest thou of your purpose? Begone and preserve the fading Flame.
Oh, thou'rt a kind Unkindled. And I a Lord of Cinder, in want of tenderness.
Thy desire is matched. Bearer of the dark sigil, and our Lord of Hollows. I present you this gift of my affection.
Our Lord and Liege. I too feel this way, but alas your lordship must come first.
Oh, good Hollow. I'm afraid I must say... Such notions will imperil thy rule.
Thou'rt a Lord, art thou not? Alas, your kindness is welcome.
Oh, my... You are stupendous. Here, I was saving this for later, but you should have it now.
Oh, how gracious. Do promise to stay safe out there, this land isn't fit for such noble hearts.
How intriguing. A rather pathetic attempt at courtship, wouldn't you say?
Well, this is unexpected, but I echo the sentiment. Very well, let us form a union.
Ah, I'm but a weary old smith. Nevertheless, take this here token as a sign of my appreciation.
Ahh, well met. Tis good to see you in good health.
I warn you, back off. I am in no mood for such trifling notions.
Well, this is a surpise. Tis good to find nobility in these trying times.
Gracious. Fine compliment thou'st given. Thou'rt has warmed thine cockles. Here, take thine token of desire.
Oh, knowest thou of that soppy gossip? Me? Thy suppeth too much on airy notions.
Ashen One, thy layeth nary a soul upon my feet?
Ashen One, to desire such soppy seconds. Thy pockets must o'erflow with good will.
Ahh, there you, Unkindled One. I wish to express my gratitude. For trusting a lowly pyromancer, and allowing me to gaze upon your majestic flame. Here, take this.
Most wise words from my beloved Unkindled.
Ah-ha, marry me? Never have I been the object of desire. This has truly renewed my flame.
Sweet champion, you are truly a blessing. You have touched me so, take this.
Oh, thank you sweet champion. I shall remember these words.
Is someone there, anyone? Don't tease me like this.
Oh, sweet champion. You wish to marry me? I am but a humble maiden, but I accept.
Well, look at me. I am truly the luckiest man in the world. Here, I obtained some truly fine treasure recently, take it.
Ah, oh, yes, of course... A lovely compliment, thank you sweetie.
Shame on you, you insatiable beast. Now is not the time for such crude remarks.
Ooh la la, you are a true romantic. To sweep the Unbreakable Patches off his feet is a feat indeed!
Thank you for such beautiful words. You know, I was working on something for you, perhaps you can have it now?
Ah, how very kind of you. May the dark cover you in its encompassing embrace.
Hello again. Could you not bother me whilst I'm focusing on such important matters?
Oh, what a kind offer. I hereby accept your proposal.
Nubet ursa raptis catulis paruis magna.
I humbly accept your compliment. Here, I found this trinket whilst scavenging, I thought you might like it.
Oh, what did you say? Those are kind words, especially for a petty thief such as me.
I-I'm not asking for flattery, leave me be.
Ahh, you love a crook like me? I must be the luckiest thief in the world.
Champion of ash. I will do anything for my master, just say the word. Here, take this token of my affection.
Ohh, I am honoured, truly. To receive such affection from a champion such as you.
Oh, my champion of ash. Now is not the time.
Ohh… Ohh, what a honour. To marry a champion of ash is a privilege indeed.
You are truly fond of me! You've a strong arm, strong faith, and most importantly, a strong heart. I am in awe, really. Here, take this as a token of my love.
You really are fond of chatting with me, aren't you? If I didn't know better, I'd think you had feelings for me! Oh, no, dear me. Pretend you didn't hear that! Hah hah hah!
Oh, there you are. You've been quiet these days.
Oh, ah hah! A proposition? The way I see it, our fates appear to be intertwined.
My servant, well met indeed. Thou'st permitted me to dream. One day, rats and humans may yet live and die together, in peace. Here, take this token of devotion.
Thou return'st? Permit me ask. Wilt thou thy human soul surrender, and pledge thyself to me for eternity?
Why comest thou here, human? Thy duplicity will not go unpunished.
Thy welcome. Rejoice, for the right to worship me is now thine.
Welcome, ashen one. I've been resting here for quite some time. Say, how would you like to try one of my enchanted oils?
Ah, hello! You don't look Hollow, far from it! I am Solaire of Astora, an adherent of the Lord of Sunlight.

Interested in a little quest are we? I've been aching to work on something truly extraordinary, but I lack a crucial ingredient.
If you would be so kind, please fetch me a tortured soul from the decrepit cathedral.
Blasted thieves! It seems that a ne'er-do-well has swiped my toolbox. Would you mind retrieving it for me? I believe I saw the rapscallion running off towards the castle.
You do not possess this ring

Affixes are used to empower accessories, increasing the strength of their effects.
This process requires Primordial Fragments, with each level of affixing requiring more.
Basic: 2 Primordial Fragments Fine: 4 Primordial Fragments Superior: 6 Primordial Fragments Exquisite: 8 Primordial Fragments Legendary: 10 Primordial Fragments
Ring of the Sun's First Born
You do not possess this offering

Imbuement is used to empower companion accessories, increasing the strength of their effects.
This process requires Ritual Incense, with each level of imbuement requiring more.
Basic: 3 Ritual Incense Fine: 6 Ritual Incense Superior: 9 Ritual Incense Exquisite: 12 Ritual Incense Legendary: 15 Ritual Incense

Ad te clamamus exsules filii Hevae...
Ad te suspiramus, gementes et flentes...
Eia, ergo, advocata nostra, illos tuos...
Et Gwyn, benedictum fructum ventris tui...
O clemens, O pia, O dulcis Gwynevere.
You are currently in Journey 8 or beyond.
Bring me any ritual incense you find. In exchange I can offer training for your companions. Don't tarry now, on you go.
Good gracious! You are a most ferverous lover, my dear. Take this token of my love.
You have returned to dear Ellie? All thanks to my ritual you see.
Where is my ritual incense? You don't have any? Get out of here then.
A marriage proposal? Well, well, well, you are a looker, so yes, I accept your offer.
Very good, very good indeed. Here, take this token of my appreciation.
Cursed one, you lack charm. Heh heh heh...
Souls! I need souls! You cursed fool! Bigger, stronger souls! Heh heh...
Well! This is a most peculiar proposal. Prepare to peer straight into the heart of souls. Heh heh heh...
Still a bit stiff, I'm afraid. I am Grudore. A wandering occultist of sorts. Bring me souls and I can provide goods and services that may be of use to you.
Thank you. This coal will help me greatly. Heh heh heh...
Incredible. You are certainly persuasive. Here, take this token of appreciation.
An apt query, but it is not the time for such questions.
You are a guest of our castle. But do not bother me further.
Is this... some sort of a dream? Of course, I accept your proposal.
I am a collector of sorts. Feel free to peruse my collection. For the right amount of souls, I may be willing to part with some items of interest.
You must possess the Seal of Judgment to peer into the past.
Survive! Every minute you will gain 10% more soul absorption.
Uno Pequeño raises his claw in thanks. As he leaves, you notice he has left you a valuable ring.
